item.title: Stubs Mocks Double and Spies When to Use One Over the Other?
item.description: In software development, especially when working with frameworks like Laravel, unit testing is crucial for ensuring code reliability and maintainability. Laravel integrates well with Mockery, a mocking framework for PHP, to help developers create test doubles. Let’s delve into the concepts of Stubs, Mocks, Doubles, and Spies, and how they’re used in Laravel testing scenarios.
